summary.span: 依据给定用户的身份验证状态和角色成员资格为该用户显示相应的内容模板。

span.span: Displays the appropriate content template for a given user, based on the user's authentication status and role membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件显示不同的网站内容模板 （或"视图"） 为不同的用户，基于是否对用户进行身份验证和哪些 Web 站点角色，因此，如果他或她属于。The control displays different Web site content templates (or "views") for different users, based on whether the user is authenticated and, if so, which Web site roles he or she belongs to. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 模板存储在属性显示到网站，这些用户未登录到任何访问者。The template stored in the property is displayed to any visitor to the Web site who has not logged in. 一旦用户登录后，站点会显示与某个用户的角色中关联的模板属性或在指定的默认模板属性。Once a user is logged in, the site displays either a template associated with one of the user's roles in the property or the default template specified in the property. 控件管理后将模板分配给任何三个模板属性的各种模板之间切换类：The control manages switching among the various templates once you assign templates to any of the three template properties of the class: - -指定要向用户未登录到网站上显示的模板。 - Specifies the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site. 在登录的用户将永远不会看到此模板。Users who are logged in will never see this template. - -指定要向已登录到网站，但不是属于任何角色组具有已定义模板的用户显示的默认模板。 - Specifies the default template to display to users who are logged in to the Web site but do not belong to any role groups with defined templates. - -指定要向登录的用户定义的角色组模板具有角色的成员显示的模板。 - Specifies the template to display to logged-in users who are members of roles with defined role-group templates. 内容模板与特定组中的角色相关联实例。Content templates are associated with particular sets of roles in instances. 在源中定义的顺序搜索角色组模板。Role-group templates are searched in the order they are defined in the source. 向用户显示的第一个匹配的角色组模板。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果用户是多个角色的成员，则使用与用户的角色的任何匹配的第一个角色组模板。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果多个模板是与单个角色相关联，则使用的第一个定义的模板。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template is used. 下表描述的行为控制时使用的模板的各种组合。The following table describes the behavior of the control when various combinations of templates are used. |LoggedIn 模板属性LoggedIn Template Property|匿名模板属性Anonymous Template Property|RoleGroups 属性RoleGroups Property|LoginView 行为LoginView behavior| |--------------------------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------|------------------------| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|不显示任何内容。Displays no content.| |SetSet|未设置Not set|未设置Not set|仅当用户登录时显示的内容。Displays content only when the user is logged in.| |未设置Not set|SetSet|未设置Not set|仅当用户未登录时显示的内容。Displays content only when the user is not logged in.| |未设置Not set|未设置Not set|SetSet|显示中的第一个模板匹配用户的角色之一的集合。Displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则显示任何内容。If no match is found, displays no content.| |SetSet|SetSet|未设置Not set|如果用户登录后，将显示在指定的模板属性。If the user is logged in, displays the template specified in the property. 如果在用户未登录，将显示在指定的模板属性。If the user in not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |SetSet|SetSet|SetSet|如果用户登录后，将显示中的第一个模板匹配用户的角色之一的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则会显示模板中指定属性。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果用户未登录，将显示在指定的模板属性。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |SetSet|未设置Not set|SetSet|如果用户登录后，将显示中的第一个模板匹配用户的角色之一的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则会显示模板中指定属性。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果用户未登录，不会显示。If the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |未设置Not set|SetSet|SetSet|如果用户登录后，将显示中的第一个模板匹配用户的角色之一的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则不会显示。If no match is found, nothing is displayed. 如果用户未登录，将显示在指定的模板属性。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| 并可用于设置任何身份验证方案的属性对象的属性。The and can be used with any authentication scheme that sets the property of the object's property. 必须配置角色管理，以便使用属性来定义模板基本 Web 站点上的用户的角色。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates base on the user's role on the Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). 方法不会设置到网页的初始焦点控件，或任何子控件。The method does not set the initial focus of the Web page to the control, or any of its child controls. 中包含的控件控件中创建后事件。Controls contained in the control are created after the event. 若要将焦点设置到包含的子控件，处理`On_PreRender`，并调用其方法。To set the focus to a child control contained by the , handle the `On_PreRender` and call its method. 此外可以使用并事件以编程方式访问中的控件控件模板。You can also use the and events to programmatically access the controls in the control templates. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                           ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为每个支持的三个模板类型设置模板控件。The following code example shows how to set templates for each of the three template types supported by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/CS/loginviewclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/VB/loginviewclassvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置向未登录到网站的用户显示的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要在未登录到网站时向网站用户显示的内容模板。The property specifies the content template to display to Web site users when they are not logged in to the Web site. 此时会显示此模板时的属性属性是`null`。This template is displayed when the property of the property is `null`. 向经过身份验证用户永远不会显示模板。The template is never displayed to authenticated users. 如果属性为空，则向未登录的用户显示任何内容。If the property is empty, no content is displayed to users who are not logged in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中指定的模板模板要显示的邀请来注册获取个性化的服务。The following code example uses the template specified in the template to display an invitation to sign up for personalized services. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 创建构成 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建的各个控件，构成控件。The method creates the individual controls that make up the control. 创建的控件集会根据为用户显示的内容模板而有所不同。The set of controls created varies according to the content template displayed for the user. 例如，当用户未登录到网站，仅在模板中包含的控件中指定创建属性。For example, when a user is not logged in to the Web site, only the controls contained in the template specified in the property are created.

summary.span: 将数据源绑定到 及其所有子控件。

span.span: Binds a data source to and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将数据绑定到源中控件及其子项。Use the method to bind data from a source to the control and its children. 此方法可解析中的所有数据绑定表达式控件和活动模板中的任何子控件。This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the control and any child controls in the active template.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否能对 控件应用主题。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes can be applied to the control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为启用主题控件。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 是否启用了主题中包含的控件属性还会影响其集合。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录搜索的控件外观应用。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果在主题目录中存在用于特定控件，则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 时属性是`false`，则不会搜索在主题目录的内容不使用属性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控件可以重写值由其父控件或包含页面的设置。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or the containing page. 例如，如果父控件具有设置为`false`，您可以有选择地应用到父项中所包含的设置的子控件的主题属性设置为`true`上各个子控件。For example, if a parent control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
ASP.NET Themes and Skins

summary.span: 获取或设置向已登录网站但不属于 属性中指定的任何角色组的网站用户显示的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to Web site users who are logged in to the Web site but are not members of one of the role groups specified in the property.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个以下条件满足时，向网站用户显示的属性：The property is displayed to Web site users when both of the following conditions are met: - 的属性属性不是 `null`The property of the property is not `null` - 用户不属于中定义的角色组属性。The user does not belong to a role group defined in the property. 属性指定用于身份验证的网站用户的默认模板。The property specifies a default template for authenticated Web site users. 如果还没有配置角色管理是唯一的模板可用于身份验证的用户。If you have not configured role management, the is the only template available for authenticated users. 有关配置角色管理的详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information about configuring role management, see [Understanding Role Management](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用向登录的用户的个性化信息中显示的链接模板。The following code example uses the template to display links to personalized information for logged-in users. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行的初始化控件。The method performs initialization for the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

summary.span: 根据登录用户的角色确定显示哪个角色组模板。

span.span: Determines which role-group template to display, based on the roles of the logged-in user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用期间事件以确定要向用户显示的内容模板。The method is called during the event to determine which content template to display to the user. 如果的属性属性是`null`，在指定的模板显示属性; 否则，显示与用户的角色关联的模板。If the property of the property is `null`, the template specified in the property is displayed; otherwise, the template associated with the user's role is displayed. 如果用户不属于定义的角色组，或如果还没有配置角色管理控件显示在指定的模板属性。If the user does not belong to a defined role group, or if you have not configured role management, the control displays the template specified in the property. 有关配置角色管理的详细信息，请参阅[角色管理提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5)。For more information about configuring role management, see [Role Management Providers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

summary.span: 在 控件切换视图之后引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件切换视图，它将从上一模板中移除的控件并从新的模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 方法调用后，会创建新的子控件。The method is called after the new child controls are created. 使用方法以执行任何处理，如数据绑定，需要初始化新的视图上的控件。Use the method to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在 控件切换视图之前引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event before the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件切换视图，它将从上一模板中移除的控件并从新的模板创建新的子控件。When the controls switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 删除以前的控件之前调用方法。The method is called before the previous controls are removed. 使用方法来执行任何必要的处理，如控件被移除之前保存控制信息。Use the method to perform any necessary processing, such as saving control information, before the controls are removed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

param.name: writer
param.span: ，用于在客户端浏览器上呈现服务器控件内容。

span.span: The used to render the server control content on the client's browser.

summary.span: 使用指定的 对象将 Web 服务器控件内容呈现给客户端浏览器。

span.span: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用来呈现服务器控件内容发送至客户端浏览器使用指定对象。The method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified object. **请注意**此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展控件。**Note** This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RoleGroups As RoleGroupCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ RoleGroups { System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ get(); };
member this.RoleGroups : System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取将内容模板与特定角色相关联的角色组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of role groups that associate content templates with particular roles.

value.span: 一个包含已定义角色组模板的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the defined role-group templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含与在网站上的各种角色关联的内容模板。The property contains the content templates associated with various roles on the Web site. 中的集合属性搜索在源中定义模板的顺序。The collection in the property is searched in the order in which templates are defined in the source. 向用户显示的第一个匹配的角色组模板。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果用户是多个角色的成员，则使用与用户的角色的任何匹配的第一个角色组模板。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果多个模板是与单个角色相关联，将使用的第一个定义的模板。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template will be used. 如果登录的用户不属于角色组集合中包含的任何角色，该站点会显示在指定的内容模板属性。If a logged-in user does not belong to any role contained in the role-group collection, the site displays the content template specified in the property. 匿名用户永远不会显示包含在任何模板集合。Anonymous users are never shown any template contained in the collection. 必须配置角色管理，以便使用属性来定义模板基于 Web 站点上的用户的角色。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates based on the user's role on the Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解角色管理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用集合。The following code example demonstrates using the collection. 因为和未设置的属性，仅向用户属于角色定义的内容模板与显示内容。Because the and properties are not set, the content is displayed only to users who belong to roles with a defined content template. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/CS/loginviewrolegroupscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/VB/loginviewrolegroupsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
.property instance string SkinID
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SkinID : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 控件的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.

value.span: 应用于 控件的外观的名称。

span.span: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中包含可用于控件的外观。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 属性指定的这些要应用于控件的外观。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 外观是特定于特定的控件;不能共享之间的不同类型的控件的外观设置。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果未设置属性，如果已定义控件使用的默认外观。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果无需外观 ID 为定义控件，则该外观应用到所有控件，不显式引用它的外观按 ID 并且未设置，若要禁用主题设置。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果为定义具有 ID 的外观控件，则该外观仅应用于控制其设置为该 id。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose is set to that ID. 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观、在运行时引发异常。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at run time.

exception.span: 主题中不存在 属性中指定的外观。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.
ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
ASP.NET Themes and Skins

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ViewChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler ViewChanged
Public Custom Event ViewChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanged;
member this.ViewChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 在视图更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件切换视图，它将从上一模板中移除的控件并从新的模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 事件引发后，会创建新的子控件。The event is raised after the new child controls are created. 使用以执行任何处理，如数据绑定，初始化新的视图上的控件所需的事件。Use the event to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户的登录状态更改到页回发期间仅引发事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果用户登录时使用，不会引发事件控件，或如果使用用户注销控件。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 事件也不会如果用户登录或注销后执行重定向。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 举例说明何时事件发生时，在用户注销通过调用方法而无需重定向到另一个页面。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 页上，为下一步的回发期间控件将检测在用户的登录状态的更改，然后引发事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanging;
member this.ViewChanging : EventHandler

summary.span: 在视图更改前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件切换视图，它将从上一模板中移除的控件并从新的模板创建新的子控件。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 删除以前的控件之前引发事件。The event is raised before the previous controls are removed. 使用事件执行任何处理，如控件被移除之前保存所需的控制信息。Use the event to perform any processing, such as saving control information, necessary before the controls are removed. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户的登录状态更改到页回发期间仅引发事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果用户登录时使用，不会引发事件控件，或如果使用用户注销控件。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 事件也不会如果用户登录或注销后执行重定向。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 举例说明何时事件发生时，在用户注销通过调用方法而无需重定向到另一个页面。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 页上，为下一步的回发期间控件将检测在用户的登录状态的更改，然后引发事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview
